Interface CommunicationHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSocketCommunicationHandler, ClientSocketCommunicationHandler, ServerSocketCommunicationHandler

    public interface CommunicationHandler
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision$ ($LastChangedDate$)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BROADCAST_SESSION
      Deprecated. 
      Broadcasting is now perfomed by the high level part of the Gateway by inspecting the message

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendMessage(Message msg, String scope)
      Send the given message to a specific scope
      void sendMessage(Message msg, String[] scope)
      Deprecated. 
      sendMessage(Message, String) should be used because the Gateway will perform security check for simulating multi-casting or broad-casting when needed

      void stop()

        static final String BROADCAST_SESSION
        Deprecated. Broadcasting is now perfomed by the high level part of the Gateway by inspecting the message

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Message msg,
                 String scope)
        Send the given message to a specific scope
        Parameters:
        msg - the Message to send
        scope - the scope of the destination of the message

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Message msg,
                 String[] scope)
        Deprecated. sendMessage(Message, String) should be used because the Gateway will perform security check for simulating multi-casting or broad-casting when needed
        Send the given message to a set of scope
        Parameters:
        msg - the Message to send
        scope - the set of scope as destination of the message
